Package grave_escape.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
grave_escape.structure.Position
grave_escape.game.MovingObject
grave_escape.player.Player
public class Player extends MovingObject
The Player class represents a player in the game. It extends the MovingObject class, allowing the player to move on a grid. The player can move in various directions while avoiding walls.

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(Position position)
      Constructs a Player object with the specified initial position.
      Parameters:
      position - the initial position of the player on the grid.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(Direction direction, int gridRows, int gridCols, List<Wall> walls)
      Moves the player in the specified direction, provided there is no wall blocking the movement. The method checks the validity of the movement and ensures the player stays within the bounds of the grid.
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to move the player.
      gridRows - the number of rows in the game grid.
      gridCols - the number of columns in the game grid.
      walls - a list of walls that the player must avoid while moving.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the direction is null or invalid.
